input.sentences: we went to town hall in the morning to figure out where we were going .
they had a map out front that showed us the town .
we started our walk behind city hall .
the streets had a lot of big | tall trees .
we saw a big hill that we had to walk down .
output.sentences: The Town hall looks amazing in the morning.
There is a map in front of the town hall.
Walking around the side of the town hall is even more amazing.
The tress located in the back of the town hall are tall.
The town hall is located on top of a big hill.
